title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Prepare dataset
text: principles variable names variable labels aim allow Saros automatically handle similar variables together, different variables separately. may seem draconian ensure confusion avoided Saros offer benefits cleaning output . R handles variable names spaces, Nordic letters, distinguishes small capital letters, odd characters, etc. limit number characters. , many programs restrictions. Keep variable names maximum 8-10 characters. Use English (ASCII) lowercase letters, numbers underscores. Variable names must start letter. Try avoid letters look upper lower case. See ?@sec-standard-variable-names Optimally, batteries share prefix variable name, unique batteries/variables. example, one can name variables s_100-s_120 one battery, g_121-g_129 another battery, etc. specify variable_name_separator = "_". However, another equally fine approach name variables self-explanatory

Best , stick ASCII. names also consistent across reports institution get usernames unique spelling. “UoM_and_LSE” one report “UoM” another report result two different sets usernames/passwords. title: Automatically Draft a Quarto Report — draft_report
text: data Survey data obj:<data.frame>|obj:<tbl_df>|obj:<srvyr> // Required data frame (srvyr-object) columns specified chapter_structure 'dep', etc columns. chapter_structure goes chapter sub-chapter obj:<data.frame>|obj:<tbl_df> // Required Data frame (tibble, possibly grouped). One row per chapter. contain columns 'chapter' 'dep', Optionally 'indep' (independent variables) informative columns needed. ... Dynamic dots <dynamic-dots> Arguments forwarded corresponding functions create elements. path Output path scalar<character> // default: tempdir() (optional) Path save output. Defaults temporary directory. title Title report scalar<character> // default: NULL (optional) Added automatically YAML-header index.qmd report.qmd-files. authors Authors entire report vector<character> // default: NULL (optional) NULL, infers chapter_structure[[authors_col]], collates entire report. multiple authors per chapter, separate semicolon. Ensure consistency. authors_col Column name author scalar<character> // default: "author" (optional) used exists. Multiple authors separated semicolon (optionally subsequent space). chapter_yaml_file Path YAML-file insert chapter qmd-file scalar<character> // default: NULL (optional) Path file used insert header YAML, chapter. chapter_qmd_start_section_filepath, chapter_qmd_end_section_filepath, index_qmd_start_section_filepath, index_qmd_end_section_filepath, report_qmd_start_section_filepath, report_qmd_end_section_filepath, Path qmd-bit start/end qmd scalar<character> // default: NULL (optional) Path qmd-snippet placed /body chapter/index/report qmd-files. index_filename Index filename scalar<character> // default: "index" (optional) name main index Quarto file used landing page report. link PDF (report.qmd) collects chapters. index_yaml_file, report_yaml_file Path YAML-file insert index.qmd report.qmd respectively scalar<character> // default: NULL (optional) Path file used insert header YAML, index report files. report_filename Report filename scalar<character> // default: "report" (optional) name main report QMD-file used compiling complete report collecting chapters folder (except ). provided, linked index. NULL, generate filename based report title, prefixed "0_". turn , set pdf=FALSE. report_includes_files Whether report.qmd includes {{< include 'chapter.qmd' >}} scalar<logical> // default: FALSE Useful mesos reports. However, bear mind including qmd files conflicting YAML-headers might risky. ignore_heading_for_group Ignore heading group vector<character> // default: NULL (optional) Type refined chapter_structure data suppress heading report output. Typically variable_name_dep, variable_name_indep, etc. replace_heading_for_group Replacing heading group named vector<character> // default: c(".variable_label_suffix_dep" = ".variable_name_dep") Occasionally, one needs replace heading another piece information refined chapter_structure. instance, one may want organize output variable_name_indep, display variable_label_indep instead. Use name replacement value original. prefix_heading_for_group, suffix_heading_for_group Prefix suffix headings vector<named character> // default: NULL (optional) Names heading_groups, values prefixes suffixes. Note prefixes end \n headings must begin new line. require_common_categories Check common categories scalar<logical> // default: NULL (optional) Whether check items share common categories. combined_report Create combined report? scalar<logical> // default: FALSE (optional) Whether create qmd file merges chapters combined report. write_qmd Toggle whether make qmd-files scalar<logical> // default: TRUE Sometimes useful create chapter_dataset files updated, without overwrite qmd files. attach_chapter_dataset Toggle inclusion chapter-specific datasets qmd-files scalar<logical> // default: FALSE Whether save chapter folder 'Rds'-file chapter-specific dataset, load top QMD-file. auxiliary_variables Auxiliary variables included datasets vector<character> // default: NULL (optional) Column names data always included datasets chapter qmd-files, attach_chapter_dataset=TRUE. publicly available. serialized_format Serialized format scalar<string> // default: "rds" Format serialized data storing chapter dataset. One "rds" (default), "qs" "fst". latter two requires respective packages installed. "qs" usually fastest space efficient, sets package dependencies report project. max_path_warning_threshold Maximum number characters paths warning scalar<integer> // default: 260 (optional) Microsoft set absolute limit 260 characters Sharepoint/OneDrive file paths. mean files cache (hash suffixes added) quickly breach limit. set, warning returned files found longer threshold. Also note spaces count three characters due URL-conversion: %20. avoid test, set Inf filename_prefix Prefix string qmd filenames scalar<character> // default: "" (optional) mesos setup might useful set files (related sub-folders) underscore (filename_prefix = "_") front stub files include main qmd files. data_filename_prefix String attached beginning data-file data-object scalar<string> // default: "data_" report_includes_prefix, report_includes_suffix Strings around files report.qmd scalar<string> // default: "\{\{< include " " >\}\}" prefix suffix chapters included report.qmd file report_includes_files = TRUE. log_file Path log file scalar<string> // default: "_log.txt" (optional) Path log file. Set NULL disable logging.

title: Processes A 'chapter_overview' Data Frame — refine_chapter_overview
text: chapter_overview goes chapter sub-chapter obj:<data.frame>|obj:<tbl_df> // Required Data frame (tibble, possibly grouped). One row per chapter. contain columns 'chapter' 'dep', Optionally 'indep' (independent variables) informative columns needed. data Survey data obj:<data.frame>|obj:<tbl_df>|obj:<srvyr> // Required data frame (srvyr-object) columns specified chapter_structure 'dep', etc columns. chunk_templates Chunk templates obj:<data.frame>|obj:<tbl_df>|NULL // default: NULL (optional) Must contain columns name (user-specified unique name template), template (chunk template {glue}-specification, variable_type_dep optionally variable_type_indep. latter two list-columns prototype vectors specifying data template applied . Can optionally contain columns whose names match default options function. override default function-wide options specific template. label_separator Variable label separator scalar<character> // default: NULL (optional) String split labels main question sub-items. name_separator Variable name separator scalar<character> // default: NULL (optional) String split column names data main question sub-items single_y_bivariates_if_indep_cats_above Single y bivariates indep-cats ... scalar<integer> // default: 3 (optional) Figures tables bivariates can become long independent variable many categories. argument specifies number indep categories single y bivariates shown. single_y_bivariates_if_deps_above Single y bivariates dep-vars ... scalar<integer> // default: 20 (optional) Figures tables bivariates can become long many dependent variables battery/question matrix. argument specifies number dep variables single y bivariates shown. Set 0 always show single y bivariates. always_show_bi_for_indep Always show bivariate indep-variable vector<character> // default: NULL (optional) Specific combinations -variable bivariates always shown. hide_bi_entry_if_sig_above p-value threshold hiding bivariate entry scalar<double> // default: 1 (optional) Whether hide bivariate entry significance value. Defaults showing . hide_chunk_if_n_below Hide result N scalar<integer> // default: 10 (optional) Whether hide result N given dataset value. NOTE: Exceptions made chr_table chr_plot typically exempted first place. might change future separate argument. hide_variable_if_all_na Hide variable outputs containing NA scalar<boolean> // default: TRUE (optional) Whether remove variables values NA. keep_dep_indep_if_no_overlap Keep dep-indep overlap scalar<boolean> // default: FALSE (optional) Whether keep dep-indep rows overlap. organize_by Grouping columns vector<character> // default: NULL (optional) Column names used identifying chapters sections. arrange_section_by Sorting columns vector<character> named vector<logical> // default: NULL (optional) Column names used sorting sections within organize_by group. Can include column present output dataframe (original generated columns). character vector, assume arranged ascending order. named logical vector, FALSE indicate ascending, TRUE descending. error thrown specified column exist output. Defaults sorting ascending order (alphabetical) commonly needed variable name/label info, descending order chunk_templates one typically wants univariates bivariates. na_first_in_section Whether place NAs first sorting scalar<logical> // default: TRUE (optional) Default ascending descending sorting dplyr::arrange() place NAs end. placed univariates end, etc. Thus, saros places NAs first section. Set FALSE override. max_width_obj, max_width_chunk, max_width_file Maximum object width scalar<integer> // default: NULL (optional) Maximum width names objects (R/Python environment), chunks (#| label: ) optional files. Note, always replace variable labels variable names, avoid long file names. Note filenames: Due OneDrive max path 400 characters, can quickly exceeded long path base path, long file names using labels part structure, hashing Quarto's cache: true feature. Thus consider restricting max_width_file lower optimally wished . max_width_folder_name Maximum clean folder name length scalar<integer> // default: NULL (optional) Whereas max_width_file truncates file name, argument truncates folder name. impact report chapter names website, folders. sep_obj, sep_chunk, sep_file Separator string scalar<character> // default: "_" (optional) Separator use grouping variables. Defaults underscore object names hyphen chunk labels file names. filename_prefix Prefix string qmd filenames scalar<character> // default: "" (optional) mesos setup might useful set files (related sub-folders) underscore (filename_prefix = "_") front stub files include main qmd files. ... Dynamic dots <dynamic-dots> Arguments forwarded corresponding functions create elements. progress Whether display progress message scalar<logical> // default: TRUE Mostly useful hide_bi_entry_if_sig_above < 1 variable_group_dep Name variable_group_dep column scalar<string> // default: ".variable_group_dep" column used group variables part bivariate analysis. variable_group_prefix Set prefix easily find labels scalar<string> // default: NULL default, .variable_group column just integers. wish use part object/label/filename numbering scheme, number informative. Hence set prefix "Group" distinguish column columns chapter_structure. n_range_glue_template_1, n_range_glue_template_2 scalar<string> // default: "{n}" "[{n[1]}, {n[2]}] (optional) Glue templates n_range columns created. log_file Path log file scalar<string> // default: "_log.txt" (optional) Path log file. Set NULL disable logging.

title: Processes A 'chapter_overview' Data Frame — refine_chapter_overview
text: grouped tibble (data.frame) columns fall two main categories: Input columns (user data): chapter (character): Chapter name (input) dep (character): Dependent variable selector (input) indep (character, optional): Independent variable selector (input) Constructed columns (start dot): .variable_name, .variable_position (character/integer): Variable name position .variable_label, .variable_label_prefix, .variable_label_suffix (character): Variable label components .variable_type, .variable_type_dep, .variable_type_indep (character): Variable type(s) .variable_name_dep, .variable_name_indep (character): Names dependent/independent variables .variable_label_prefix_dep, .variable_label_prefix_indep (character): Label prefixes dep/indep .variable_group_dep (character/factor): Grouping variable bivariate analysis .variable_group_id (integer): Numeric group identifier bivariate analysis .chapter_number (integer): Chapter number .template_name (character): Name chunk template used .obj_name, .chunk_name, .file_name (character): Object, chunk, file names (output) .n, .n_range (integer/character): Sample size range .n_cats_dep, .n_cats_indep (integer): Number categories dep/indep .max_chars_labels_dep, .max_chars_labels_indep (integer): Max label length dep/indep .max_chars_cats_dep, .max_chars_cats_indep (integer): Max category label length dep/indep .n_dep, .n_indep (integer): Number dep/indep variables group .bi_test, .p_value (character/numeric): Statistical test name p-value bivariates .keep_bi_rows (logical): Whether bivariate row kept columns may present depending chunk templates options. Row count estimate: number rows output depends number chapters, dep/indep combinations, chunk templates. Typically, sum unique variable combinations specified chapter_overview, expanded chunk templates filtered significance options. simple overview, expect one row per variable per chapter; bivariates, one row per dep-indep pair. Grouping variables: columns used grouping (.e., dplyr::grouped_df) determined organize_by argument. default, includes .chapter_number, .variable_label_prefix_dep, .variable_name_indep, .template_name, can customized. columns define output grouped analysis reporting. See function source documentation details column's meaning usage.

title: Create directory structure for mesos reports (improved version) — setup_mesos_structure
text: main_directory String. Path structure created. Can absolute path relative path. path created exist. Unlike setup_mesos(), parameter required default avoid accidental file creation unexpected locations. files_to_process Character vector paths template QMD files use basis creating stub files. files typically filenames starting underscore (e.g., _report.qmd). mesos_groups named list data frame specifying grouping structure. named list: names mesos variable names, values character vectors group names. Example: list(region = c("North", "South", "East")) data frame: Use format setup_mesos() - list single-column data frames optional variable labels. mesos_var_subfolder Optional character vector. Subfolder path(s) within mesos variable folder group folders placed. Default subfolder (empty character vector). files_taking_title Character vector filenames receive title metadata. Default c("index.qmd", "report.qmd"). subtitle_separator String NULL. string, adds title subtitle fields _metadata.yml files deepest child folders. subtitle concatenation output directory basename, mesos variable label, group name. Default " - ". Set NULL disable. include_prefix, include_suffix Strings include directive stub QMD files. Default creates Quarto-style includes: {{< include "..." >}}
